imdb.title: Himouto! Umaruchan
imdb.plot: In public, Umaru is the perfect vision of a beautiful and smart high school girl. At home, she morphs into the ultimate slob with the ability to game all night and binge on junk food and cola. Can her big brother, Taihei, change her?

episodes.title: Himouto! Umaru-chanS: 1
episodes.plot: The first of the shorts included on the Blu-ray/DVD release. This one features Taihei coming home to multiple Umarus from parallel universes.

episodes.title: The Himouto Returns
episodes.plot: Umaru's life continues filled with video games and no brother in sight. Later Umaru goes to play soccer with her friends.

episodes.title: Umaru and Alex
episodes.plot: Taihei invites his coworkers over for dinner after work, and one of them, Alex, catches Umaru's attention. Why does this guy seem so familiar, and what's his deal with anime?

episodes.title: Umaru and Friends
episodes.plot: Alex interrupts Kirie and Umaru's afternoon to play a dating sim game. Kirie finds herself identifying with the main character. Later, Umaru discovers an addictive new game.

episodes.title: A Party with the Whole Gang
episodes.plot: Umaru spends Christmas evening with her friends, and Sylphyn remembers a childhood Christmas wish. On New Year's morning, Umaru receives a suspicious gift from Taihei.

episodes.title: Big Brother Departs
episodes.plot: Taihei leaves for a business trip with his co-workers. While his boss Kanau thinks of a way to spend time with him, Taihei has his hands full with a vacation-happy stowaway.

episodes.title: Umaru and Dreams
episodes.plot: While visiting Umaru, Kirie's secret aspiration is found out. Will Umaru's encouragement be enough to help Kirie overcome her self-doubt?

episodes.title: Umaru and Amusement Parks
episodes.plot: Umaru and the girls head out to spend a fun day at the amusement park, but Kirie is having a few struggles. Will the day end up a total disaster?

episodes.title: Umaru and Hikari
episodes.plot: Umaru and the gang have a spontaneous get-together, but when things don't go as expected, hilarity ensues.

episodes.title: Umaru and Memories
episodes.plot: After Bomba gives Taihei one of his old cameras, Taihei spends sometime reconnecting with Umaru. Later, the tension between Hikari and Umaru increases.

episodes.title: First Time for Everyone
episodes.plot: Sylphin invites UMR over to her house, where a slight misunderstanding leads to some awkwardness. Later on, Umaru seems to have found a weakness in Hikari's armor.

episodes.title: Umaru and the Starry Sky
episodes.plot: Kirie devises a new plan to bring Ebina and Taihei closer. However, Taihei might have a couple to many little sisters fighting for his attention already

episodes.title: Everyone and Umaru
episodes.plot: It's the end of the year, and everyone is figuring out what Christmas gifts to get their loved ones. Can Umaru and the others find the perfect presents?

episodes.title: Umaru and Onii-chan
episodes.plot: Responsible Taihei has to deal with his lazy little sister, Umaru, who trashes his apartment and throws tantrums to get manga and junk food.

episodes.title: Umaru and Ebina-chan
episodes.plot: Taihei comes home to a complete stranger: Umaru's public face. She's cleaned the apartment and hidden her games to be able to invite her classmate and neighbor, Ebina, over.

episodes.title: Umaru and Her Student
episodes.plot: Umaru's sulky, glaring classmate, Motoba, has unexpectedly shown up at her door... while she's wearing her hood! Is her secret out?

episodes.title: Umaru and Her Rival
episodes.plot: Umaru, aka UMR, is a force to be reckoned with in the arcade. She's invited to participate in a fighting game championship only to bump into her school rival, Tachibana.

episodes.title: Umaru and Summer Vacation
episodes.plot: Summer vacation means hours at the arcade! Umaru instructs in the fine art of enjoying summer like a (lazy) pro. Later, Taihei endures another typical day at work.

episodes.title: Umaru's Birthday
episodes.plot: Taihei and Umaru experiment with free time and personal space in their little apartment, and playing "The Game of Life" hits too close to home for them all.

episodes.title: Umaru's Onii-chan
episodes.plot: People in his office have seen Taihei walking home and going shopping with a hot girl! His coworker comes over for a visit to see this so-called "sister" for himself.

episodes.title: Umaru and Christmas and New Year's
episodes.plot: In the Doma household, winter means lazy days beneath the kotatsu! Umaru reflects on her interesting year while Taihei tries to collect on a promise she made to him.

episodes.title: Umaru and Valentine's
episodes.plot: It's Valentines Day! Kirie burns cookies, Ebina attempts to make chocolate, and Umaru continues to offload food prep to Taihei.

episodes.title: Umaru and Now and Once Upon a Time
episodes.plot: Umaru gets sick, but it's a good thing her germs are as lazy as she is! Sadly, her germs show her brother no mercy. Later, Taihei remembers a day at the arcade, 10 years ago.

episodes.title: Umaru's Days
episodes.plot: Umaru and Ebina discover that their appetites match, the council in Umaru's head furiously debates about the perfect snack, and Taihei tries to get Kirie excited for summer.

episodes.title: Umaru and Everyone
episodes.plot: Umaru(16) is a renowned beautiful girl in public. A kind hearted, perfect sister with high scores and admired by everybody. At least that's what everyone believes...once she returns home she becomes...

episodes.title: OVA: Umaru-chan One More Time!
episodes.plot:

episodes.title: OVA: The Secret Umaru-chan
episodes.plot:
